name: CMGMT_EPISODE_CASE_TEAM
description: This table contains the providers and pools that are responsible for performing ongoing outreach related to a Coordinated Care Management episode.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MANAGER_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the provider responsible for performing ongoing patient outreach related to this Coordinated Care Management episode.

columns.name: POOL_REGISTRY_ID
columns.description: Stores the pool of providers responsible for performing ongoing patient outreach related to this Coordinated Care Management episode.

columns.name: POOL_REGISTRY_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date on which the provider or pool starts being responsible for reviewing the Coordinated Care Management episode.

columns.name: TERMINATION_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date on which the provider or pool stops being responsible for reviewing the Coordinated Care Management episode.

columns.name: RELATIONSHIP_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the type of relationship between the case manager and patient.

columns.name: REV_FREQ_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the review frequency unit that indicates how often the manager or pool performs patient outreach.

columns.name: REVIEW_DUE_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date by which the provider or pool must next complete the Coordinated Care Management episode review.

columns.name: REVIEW_DUE_TASK_ID
columns.description: Stores the task record in the Coordinated Care Management episode checklist that indicates the next review date. This task is generated by the system when a review due date (I HSB 18140) is set.

columns.name: LAST_REVIEW_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date on which the provider or pool performed the last Coordinated Care Management episode review.

columns.name: MANAGER_IS_PRIMARY_YN
columns.description: This flag indicates whether the provider or pool is primarily responsible for the Coordinated Care Management episode. Only one provider/pool can be primarily responsible on any given effective date.
